an5.238:1.1: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.238:1.3: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism,
an5.238:1.4: and they criticize those deserving of praise.
an5.238:1.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.238:2.1: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.238:2.3: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism,
an5.238:2.4: and they praise those deserving of praise.
an5.238:2.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
